headline.main: CHUNGKING CLAIMS CHINESE VICTORIES; Eight Japanese Assaults North of Changsha Are Reported to Have Been Repulsed KIANGSI GAIN ALSO LISTED Invaders Are Said to Have Lost Several Points in Suiyuan on Friday

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Dec. 31 (U.P.) (From Chinese broadcast recorded by The United Press in San Francisco) -- A Chinese war communique today claimed Chinese successes against Japanese forces on three scattered fronts. The communique covered yesterday's activities on the North Hunan and North Kiangsi fronts and week-end fighting on the distant Suiyuan front in Northwest China.
abstract: Chinese claim gains, North Hunan, North Kiangsi and Suiyan fronts
